sect3.title: Text Editor
sect3.para: The gedit text-editor now provides spell-checking. And there's an output window to show feedback when doing special processing.

sect3.title: Character Map
sect3.para: The Character Map now has unicode support, allowing you to select a full range of characters in a wide range of fonts. Users may be interested in the Unicode Character Map [gucharmap] that should be released in the Fifth Toe, later this year.
